vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in TokenMetadata.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.21', '^0.4.24']
	- TokenMetadata.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
	- TokenMetadata.sol#25 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
	- TokenMetadata.sol#37 declares pragma solidity^0.4.21

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function allowance(address _ocwner, address _spender) public view returns (uint256);

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success);

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool);

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in TokenMetadata.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (TokenMetadata.sol#37): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_tokenURI' of ERC20WithMetadata. (TokenMetadata.sol#53) is not in mixedCase
